name: Mirrored Plane
description:
Mirrored Plane Reality is more than it seems

Mirrored Plane is a narrative heavy game with a focus on aesthetics and story. Follow Lira, a girl who finds herself between two worlds in a war beyond her reality.

•••

This game is an attempt at showcasing the aesthetics and storytelling of the team, and as a way of self-expression through a digital medium.

The game is still very early in development, but we're publishing the project as it serves to give an idea of the general tone.

With music by Arkana: https://soundcloud.com/arkana-music-official
